trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Morrison
There were no other sightings in Morrison on or around April 1st 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsAt around 7:40 I noticed 2 star -like bright lights in the sky a distance from each other. Both moved up and down for about an hour as a watched it. I noticed the first which was situated north of Morrison, CO before sun down. It seemed to bright to be a star so I watched it further. It first was just above the ridge line then moved up and stood still for about an hour. Right after the first sighting a second one south of the first appeared even brighter and moved up then disappeared doing this 3 times as the first stayed in place. About a half hour after the sightings there were jets of some sort (military?) flying around circling about a 10 mile radius. More jets appeared shortly after. These were without a doubt a phenomenon and am now convinced. Even more so as I saw 4 jets flying in circles around that area during and after the event. I was at work (delivery driver) so I never managed to take photos and when I got home they had already disappeared. Someone must have witnessed this event. It was obvious.
